definition: the conscious subjective aspect of feeling or emotion, to act physically on
details:
noun
- the conscious subjective aspect of feeling or emotion
verb
- to act physically on
= example: to act physically on
- to have an effect upon or make a difference on something
= example: to have an effect upon or make a difference on something
= synonyms: touch
- to make believe with the intent to deceive
= example: to make believe with the intent to deceive
= synonyms: sham
- to have an emotional or cognitive impact upon
= example: to have an emotional or cognitive impact upon
= synonyms: strike
- to connect closely and often incriminatingly
= example: to connect closely and often incriminatingly
= synonyms: regard
